newsitem.title: NAMIBIA: NAMIBIA STOCKS WEEK -STRONG GAINS FOR LOCAL SHARES.
newsitem.headline: NAMIBIA STOCKS WEEK -STRONG GAINS FOR LOCAL SHARES.

text.p: Last week saw strong gains for
several local shares including grovcery buying group Sentra
Namibia which soared to end the week at N$4.75 after opening at
Ocean Diamond Mining, traded on both the Namibian and
Johannesburg Stock Exchanges, was the best performer of the week
ending at N$7.30 after starting at N$6.10.
Both CIC Holdings and Namibia Breweries edged up and down
around similar prices and ende at N$2.70 and N$2.60
The total value of shares traded during the week was over
N$825,000.00 for a total volume of 278,990 shares traded.
The NSE overall index ended the week at 226.62, up from the
previous Friday's close of 221.56. The local NSE index also
gained, to close at 154.64, up from the previous week's close of
